title: Microsoft Windows version history
content: Microsoft Windows was announced by Bill Gates on 10 November 1983, 2 years before it was first released.[1] Microsoft introduced Windows as a graphical user interface for MS-DOS, which had been introduced two years earlier.[2] The product line evolved in the 1990s from an operating environment into a fully complete, modern operating system over two lines of development, each with their own separate codebase.
